programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: A group of Allied soldiers are intent on breaking out, not only to escape, but also to draw Nazi forces away from battle to search for fugitives. Among the prisoners are American Captain Virgil Hilts and British Squadron Leader Roger Bartlett.

programme.title: The African Queen, (1951, Adventure)
programme.desc: An imperious woman (Katharine Hepburn) makes a gin-soaked boat captain (Humphrey Bogart) fight Germans in the World War I Congo.

programme.title: The Wasp, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two estranged friends unveil a dangerous and deceptive plot that forever changes their lives.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge, (1992, Romance)
programme.desc: An ex-hockey player (D.B. Sweeney) and a prima donna (Moira Kelly) bicker as paired figure skaters shooting for the Olympics.

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral, (1994, Romance)
programme.desc: An English charmer (Hugh Grant) and a lusty American (Andie MacDowell) make love over a course of surprising events.

programme.title: Legally Blonde, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: A sorority queen (Reese Witherspoon) enrolls in Harvard to prove to her former boyfriend that she has more than good looks.

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fired from her firm, a young Boston lawyer (Reese Witherspoon) heads to Washington, D.C., to fight for animal rights.

programme.title: The Addams Family, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a man claiming to be Fester, the missing brother of Gomez Addams, arrives at the Addams' home, the family is thrilled. Morticia begins to suspect the man is a fraud, since he cannot recall details of Fester's life.

programme.title: Addams Family Values, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Upon arrival of their mustachioed baby, Morticia and Gomez hire a greedy nanny who targets Uncle Fester.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: Lackluster baseball players (Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) hear their Cleveland team's new owner is counting on them to lose.

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Romance)
programme.desc: A literary baseball groupie (Susan Sarandon) romances a pitcher (Tim Robbins) and a catcher (Kevin Costner) on a minor-league North Carolina team.

programme.title: 48 HRS., (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A rumpled detective gets a slick convict released into his custody for two days to help him find a murderer in San Francisco.

programme.title: Dog, (2022, Comedy)
programme.desc: With a dog named Lulu by his side, Army Ranger Briggs races down the Pacific Coast to make it to a soldier's funeral on time. Along the way, Briggs and Lulu drive each other completely crazy, break a handful of laws and narrowly evade death.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: The characters come together for a final confrontation with unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: Jason's Lyric, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: A TV salesman falls for a spirited waitress and clashes with his wayward brother, as their lives reconnect in inner-city Houston.

programme.title: Our Kind of Traitor, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A money launderer (Stellan Skarsgard) for Russian gangsters asks a couple vacationing in Marrakech, Morocco, to deliver incriminating evidence to an MI6 agent (Damian Lewis).

programme.title: Bones and All, (2022, Romance)
programme.desc: Love blossoms between a young woman on the margins of society and a disenfranchised drifter as they embark on a 3,000-mile odyssey through the backroads of America.

programme.title: Dark Harvest, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Teens confront a legendary supernatural specter that emerges from the cornfields of a small Midwestern town every fall.

programme.title: A House on the Bayou, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Hoping for an idyllic getaway, a couple and their daughter visit a remote mansion in rural Louisiana. When suspiciously friendly neighbors show up uninvited, the weekend soon takes a sinister turn as dark secrets test the family's fragile bond.

programme.title: Blink Twice, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: When tech billionaire Slater King meets Frida, he invites her to join him and his friends for a dream vacation on his private island. However, when strange things start to happen, she'll have to uncover the truth if she hopes to make it out alive.

programme.title: Ben-Hur, (2016, Adventure)
programme.desc: A prince (Jack Huston) endures years of slavery to take vengeance on his adopted brother (Toby Kebbell), a Roman officer who falsely accused him of treason.

programme.title: Ronin, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: An Irish ringleader (Natascha McElhone) organizes an international team of hired guns (Robert De Niro, Jean Reno) to retrieve a briefcase from criminals.

programme.title: Training Day, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: A rookie police officer meets a corrupt Los Angeles narcotics detective who wants to include him in his schemes.

programme.title: Novocaine, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage. He fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Though Prohibition agent Eliot Ness attempts to take Al Capone down, even his best efforts fail due to widespread corruption within the Windy City's police force.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: The characters come together for a final confrontation with unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Telling fortunes to support herself and her daughter, a psychic widow (Cate Blanchett) assists the police in a missing persons case.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: After her dreams of becoming a WNBA player are cut short by a tragic accident, Zainab Johnson finds her way to the stage, where her smart and edgy storytelling is informed by her experiences growing up in Harlem in an African-American Muslim family.

programme.title: Snack Shack, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Best friends AJ and Moose seize the opportunity to run the local pool's rundown snack shack. However, things take an unexpected turn when they meet Brooke, an effortlessly cool lifeguard who puts their big summer plans -- and friendship -- at risk.

programme.title: Jacob's Ladder, (1990, Horror)
programme.desc: A Vietnam vet prone to flashbacks walks the edge of sanity as he searches for the cause of his nightmarish visions.

programme.title: Pet Sematary: Bloodlines, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: In 1969, a young Jud Crandall dreams of leaving his hometown of Ludlow, Maine, behind but soon discovers sinister secrets buried within and is forced to confront a dark family history that will forever keep him connected to Ludlow.

programme.title: Invaders From Mars, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A boy (Hunter Carson) sees his parents and neighbors act like zombies after a flying saucer lands in his back yard.

programme.title: The Dark Half, (1993, Horror)
programme.desc: A Maine professor's (Timothy Hutton) hidden bad side comes alive under his notorious but successful pen name.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist (Ben Kingsley) leads the hunt for a genetically engineered creature who morphs into a human blonde and tries to reproduce in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Species II, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A half-alien female (Natasha Henstridge) escapes from a government compound to search for the half-alien male who has been raping and fatally impregnating women.

programme.title: The Haunting, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: When New York City comes under attack from an alien invasion, a woman and other survivors try to find a way to safety. They soon learn that they must remain absolutely silent as the mysterious creatures are drawn to the slightest sound.

programme.title: Smile 2, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Global pop sensation Skye Riley begins to experience increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and pressures of fame, she must face her dark past to regain control of her life.

programme.title: Rings, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: A young woman (Matilda Lutz) makes a horrifying discovery after her boyfriend (Alex Roe) investigates a story about a mysterious video that kills people seven days after they watch it.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men (John Goodman, John Gallagher Jr.).

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2024, Musical)
programme.desc: A new student gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics. However, when she makes the misstep of falling for the queen bee's ex-boyfriend, she finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Barbershop: The Next Cut, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: With the barbershop now coed, Calvin (Ice Cube), Eddie (Cedric the Entertainer) and the rest of the gang come up with a plan to save the neighborhood from crime.

programme.title: Rob Roy, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: The Scottish folk hero (Liam Neeson) fights for clan and honor, hunted by vile aristocrats in the 1700s.

programme.title: Shutter Island, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: A 1950s lawman (Leonardo DiCaprio) pursues a murderess who appears to have vanished from a locked room within a fortresslike psychiatric hospital.

programme.title: Cujo, (1983, Horror)
programme.desc: Bitten by a rabid bat, a huge dog traps a Maine woman (Dee Wallace) and her young son (Danny Pintauro) in their Ford Pinto.

programme.desc: Luke Ellis wakes up at The Institute, a facility that abducts teenagers with psychic powers; Ms. Sigsby, the place's charismatic director, claims they're saving the world; Tim Jamieson hides from his haunted past as a small-town night knocker.

programme.desc: Luke bonds with the other Front Half residents and begins plotting his escape; Ms. Sigsby manages the fallout from a security breach; in town, Tim begins to look into The Institute, only to find himself caught up in a high-stakes standoff.

programme.title: Children of a Lesser God, (1986, Drama)
programme.desc: Starting his new job as an instructor at a New England school for the deaf, James Leeds meets Sarah Norman, a young deaf woman who works at the school as a member of the custodial staff.

programme.desc: A rumpled detective gets a slick convict released into his custody for two days to help him find a murderer in San Francisco.

programme.desc: A hip detective (Eddie Murphy) from Detroit tracks a crime ring to a Los Angeles fun park called WonderWorld.

programme.title: Catch Me if You Can, (2002, Comedy)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon, (1987, Action)

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman, Stan, Kyle e Kenny esto na deles quando aparece um grupo de jovens bailarinos de breakdance que os desafia para uma competio de dana. Stan, que decide montar uma equipe com os melhores danarinos para poder ganhar deles.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Humanos do ano 3045 esto chegando em South Park atravs de um portal do tempo para buscar trabalho. Quando os rapazes conseguem fazer um dinheirinho extra, os imigrantes do tempo roubam os trabalhos deles.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O senhor Michael Jack... Jefferson est morando em South Park. Enquanto os rapazes curtem a casa cheia de jogos e animais, a polcia fica contrariada pelo fato de ter que lidar com um negro rico e querem incrimin-lo de qualquer maneira.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os protetores dos animais se manifestam contra o uso de uma vaca como mascote da escola, e os estudantes se veem forados a buscarem uma nova mascote, o que gera um conflito entre Cartman e Kyle, j que ambos tem ideias diferetes.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: South Park est emocionada pela inaugurao de uma sucursal do Wall-Mart na cidade. Logo todos aproveitam sua enorme variedade de produtos e ofertas, e deixam de comprar nos negcios locais, levando-os falncia.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes guardaram um segredo durante cinco anos sobre um incidente ilegal que cometeram na pr-escola, pelo qual Trent Boyett foi parar em um reformatrio. Mas agora, Boyett est em liberdade e com sede de vingana.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman, Jimmy, Kyle, Stan, Butters e Token produzem suas prprias notcias matinais na estao de televiso interna da escola e ficam praticamente presos em uma intensa competio por conseguir a maior quantidade de audincia.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Paris Hilton visita South Park para inaugurar sua loja "Tonta, puta e mimada" e, ao ver que ela um modelo para uma enorme quantidade de garotas, Wendy se preocupa muito.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman estava tentando voar, mas o mximo que conseguiu foi um golpe na cabea e isso fez com que ele ficasse dois dias em coma. A polcia local assume que agora Cartman tem poderes psquicos e que pode resolver casos extraordinrios.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan se encontra com alguns lindos animaizinhos do bosque, que pedem para ele alguns favores inocentes. Aps ajudar todos eles, Stan descobre que na verdade eles tem um plano para trazer o anticristo para o mundo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Aps passar por uma operao para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O pai de Kyle compra um carro hbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta a melhor opo para cuidar do planeta. Porm, ao brigar com todos em funo de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para So Francisco com sua famlia.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Toalhinha perde o seu emprego e decide escrever um livro sobre sua vida. Aps ouvir "no" tantas vezes por ser uma toalha, decide se disfarar de humano e finalmente consegue fazer com que o seu livro seja publicado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Al Gore visita a escola de South Park e tenta convencer Stan, Kyle, Cartman e Kenny para sair e caar o perigoso homem-urso-porco. Ao ajud-lo nesta misso, os rapazes acabam ficando presos em uma caverna.

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband shes convicted of murdering staged his own death and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find himand that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: The Art of War, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

programme.title: The Hunted, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The FBI's most famous tracker is on the trail of a villain who murders people in order to become the subject of a manhunt.

programme.title: American Heist, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: James (Hayden Christensen) and his older brother Frankie (Adrien Brody) turn to underworld connections in hopes that one last heist will be the answer to change both of their lives.

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: Limitless, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities transforms a struggling writer into a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

programme.title: The Lookout, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Chris "Slapshot" Pratt, whose once-bright future has been dimmed by a severe head injury, is a night janitor at a bank. Lonely and frustrated, he falls prey to a con man and agrees to help rob the bank where he works.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: The Lookout, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Chris "Slapshot" Pratt, whose once-bright future has been dimmed by a severe head injury, is a night janitor at a bank. Lonely and frustrated, he falls prey to a con man and agrees to help rob the bank where he works.

programme.title: Before The Devil Knows You're Dead, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Andy, an overextended payroll executive, lures his younger brother, Hank, into a larcenous scheme: the pair will rob a suburban mom-and-pop jewelry store that appears to be the quintessential easy target.

programme.title: Thief, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Michael Mann directs this stylishly photographed action-packed drama that stars James Caan as a master safe cracker who is planning his last heist for the sake of a woman (Tuesday Weld).

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: Thelma & Louise, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: In one of the greatest road movies of all time, Geena Davis and Susan Sarandon ride to everlasting fame as two women who embark on a crime spree across the American southwest.

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Kingpin, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

programme.title: Deep Impact, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a couple of young astronomers discover an enormous comet on course to collide with Earth, the countdown to doomsday begins and the human race embarks on the fight for survival.

programme.title: Sliding Doors, (1998, Romance)
programme.desc: The split-second moments that can take a life down one path instead of another form the tantalizing 'what if?' in this delightful romantic comedy starring Gwyneth Paltrow.

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Kingpin, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

programme.title: Deep Impact, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a couple of young astronomers discover an enormous comet on course to collide with Earth, the countdown to doomsday begins and the human race embarks on the fight for survival.

programme.title: Rancho Deluxe, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: Jack (Jeff Bridges) and Cecil (Sam Waterston) are an oddball team of modern-day Montana cattle rustlers, and theyve set their sights on a pair of unlikely ranch owners from New York (Clifton James, Elizabeth Ashley). But can they outfox the foxes?

programme.title: The Long Goodbye, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Under the inimitable direction of Robert Altman, Elliot Gould stars as the laid-back, legendary private eye Philip Marlowe investigating a mysterious murder. Also stars Sterling Hayden and Nina Van Pallandt.

programme.title: Busting, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Elliott Gould and Robert Blake star in this comedy/drama about vice officers, assigned to the mean streets of L.A., who wage a war against crooked cops on the force.

programme.title: Capricorn One, (1977, Thriller)
programme.desc: A NASA Mars mission won't work, and its funding is endangered, so they decide to fake it just this once. But then they have to keep the secret.

programme.title: Escape To Athena, (1979, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: A World War II adventure, involving a group of Allied POWs, Nazis, black market priceless art treasures, Greek resistance, a Greek monastery, and a secret German rocket base.

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan stars as a rollerball champ in this fast-hitting, action- packed glimpse of a future where a brutal, no-holds-barred sport takes the place of war, and murder is just part of the game.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 1: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel: she will defeat Kaiba with sacrifice's blast! How can Kaiba win when it's predestined that he will lose? Kaiba must change the future!
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 2: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Marik's evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and Millennium Ring, with the loser being trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever. To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally another Marik?
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 1: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura and good Marik summon The Winged Dragon of Ra, ready to blast and banish evil Marik into the Shadow Realm. But The Winged Dragon of Ra has more than one special ability, and evil Marik knows how to use them all.
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 2: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's blimp is hijacked by a mysterious boy named Noah and his henchmen - five familiar foes from Yugi and Kaiba's past who are out for revenge!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first to duel under the all-new Deck Master System is Yugi against Big 1 Gansley's Deepsea Warrior! Can Yugi master the complex new rules, or will the rules master him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Yugi struggles to make heads or tails of the Deck Master System, Big 1 uses his Deck Master ability to send all of Yugi's attacks right back! How can Yugi defeat an opponent when his attacks take away his own life points?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's running out of life points, but can his cute little Deck Master Kuriboh unleash his furry fury to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Prepare for a feathered fight when Ta squares off against Big 2 Crump's Nightmare Penguin where the loser will be trapped forever in a block of ice!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Just when Joey seems to gain the upper hand, he hits the longest streak of bad luck in the history of mankind! Has Joey's fortunes finally run out, or is a crooked judge ignoring the rules of the law?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: One down, two to go! With the loss of Tristan, Serenity is heartbroken. Can she pull herself together and remember the lessons Tristan taught her to turn the duel around?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tristan's back... but he's not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba! It's time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he's confronted by Big 5 Leichter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 5's Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba's monsters from deep space! Mokuba's unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba arrives at Noah's sanctuary to rescue Mokuba, but Mokuba wants to stay with Noah! Has Mokuba seen the evil within Kaiba, or is something more sinister in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: After reuniting with Nami, Luffy and the gang are invited to the royal palace of Neptune, god of the sea! Meanwhile, the New Fish-Man Pirates exploit the power of a designer steroid in order to terrorize humans!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE RYUGU PALACE! TAKEN BY THE SHARK THAT THEY SAVED!

programme.title: A trio of unsuspecting mermaids find themselves in hot water after releasing a bad guy from his barrel of a prison. Over at the royal palace, Luffy gets up close and personal with the Mermaid Princess!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A COWARD AND A CRYBABY! THE PRINCESS IN THE HARD SHELL TOWER!

programme.title: Luffy's lightning reflexes spare the Mermaid Princess from a grisly death, Neptune's army attempts to apprehend the Straw Hats, and Captain Vander Decken forges a sinister undersea alliance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IT'S AN EMERGENCY! THE RYUGU PALACE IS OCCUPIED!

programme.title: With their backs against the wall, the Straw Hats are forced to take King Neptune and his men hostage. On the other side of the palace, Luffy and the Mermaid Princess make plans to visit the Sea Forrest!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE RYUGU PALACE IN SHOCK! THE KIDNAPPING OF SHIRAHOSHI!

programme.title: Luffy accidentally "kidnaps" the Mermaid Princess, an old friend issues a grave warning to Chopper and Sanji, and the New Fish-Man Pirates prepare for a raid on Ryugu Palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HORDY'S ONSLAUGHT! THE RETALIATORY PLAN SET INTO MOTION!

programme.title: Captain Vander Decken and Hordy Jones manage to successfully breach the defenses of Ryugu Palace. Meanwhile, Jimbei waits patiently for Luffy to arrive at the Sea Forest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IN RYUGU PALACE! ZORO VS. HORDY!

programme.title: Robin ventures into the forest in search of ancient secrets, Zoro takes to the water for a slicing, dicing showdown with Hordy Jones, and Luffy is branded a royal kidnapper by an angry mob of fish folk!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KEEP SHIRAHOSHI SAFE! DECKEN CLOSE BEHIND!

programme.title: Luffy, Chopper, and Sanji are taken prisoner by a fish mob just as Vander Decken launches an attack the princess! Elsewhere, Zoro continues his battle with Hordy, and Nami hitches a ride on a mermaid to escape the crumbling palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HATS DEFEATED?! HORDY GAINS CONTROL OF THE RYUGU PALACE!

programme.title: Zoro and Neptune fight bravely, but they're no match for Hordy and his pill-popping minions. Back at the ship, Luffy reunites with Jimbei, who reveals something sinister about his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE HAUNTING TIES! NAMI AND THE FISHMAN PIRATES!

programme.title: The New Fish-Man Pirates continue their bloody and violent uprising, and Jimbei begins the story of how he unleashed the monster known as Arlong on the unsuspecting citizens of the East Blue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A HERO WHO FREED THE SLAVES! AN ADVENTURER TIGER!

programme.title: Jimbei continues his story with tales of fish-men taken as slaves, Queen Otohime's fierce devotion to her people, the legend of Fisher Tiger, and the sinister rise of Arlong.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KIZARU APPEARS! A TRAP TO CATCH TIGER!

programme.title: Arlong's violent tendencies are condemned by Fisher Tiger, and the arrival of a young human girl teaches the Fish-Man Pirates a lesson in compassion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Team is Formed! Save Chopper

programme.title: The great pirate Fisher Tiger keeps his promise to a young slave girl, but the adults in her village are determined to make him pay for his act of honor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DEATH OF THE HERO! A SHOCKING TRUTH OF TIGER!

programme.title: In the wake of Fisher Tiger's tragic death, the once-mighty Sun Pirates are splintered by an ongoing quarrel between Jimbei and Arlong. Meanwhile, Queen Otohime's ceasless quest to help her people begins to take its toll.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SUN PIRATES SPLIT! JIMBEI VS. ARLONG!

programme.title: Tensions run high when a slave-owning Celestial Dragon washes up on Fish-Man Island. His former captives cry for out for blood, but Queen Otohime sees it as a chance to mend fences between the gilled and non-gilled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHAKING FISHMAN ISLAND! A CELESTIAL DRAGON DRIFTS IN!

programme.title: After an agonizing absence, Queen Otohime returns to her people with exciting news. Unfortunately, a horrific act of violence derails the queen's mission and changes life on Fish-Man Island forever.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SUDDEN TRAGEDY! A GUNSHOT SHUTS DOWN THE FUTURE!

programme.title: Jimbei reaches the heartbreaking conclusion in the story of Queen Otohime, Nami does something completely unexpected, and Hordy Jones makes a foreboding appearance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO THE PRESENT! HORDY MAKES A MOVE!

programme.title: Hordy announces his sinister plans for Fish-Man Island. Luffy and Shirahoshi are ready to fight, but Jimbei wants to wage this war on his own!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE KINGDOM IN SHOCK! AN ORDER TO EXECUTE NEPTUNE ISSUED!

programme.title: Luffy and Jimbei come to blows over how to handle Hordy's uprising. Back at the palace, Brook embarks on an out-of-body experience with hopes of saving his mates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A RIFT OPENS UP! LUFFY VS. JIMBEI!

programme.title: Jimbei and Luffy continue their standoff, the New Fish-Man pirates go on a rampage, and Hordy begins to experience startling side effects from his pill-popping habit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SOMETHING HAS HAPPENED TO HORDY! THE TRUE POWER OF THE EVIL DRUG!

programme.title: Hordy's rampant use of the energy steroid makes him bigger, stronger, and scarier than ever before! The Fish-Man princes join the battle, but even they may not be strong enough to stop Hordy's onslaught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IS ON! AT CONCHCORDE PLAZA!

programme.title: Jimbei and Shirahoshi are captured by the enemy, and Hordy makes a shocking revelation to the population of Fish-Man Island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SURPRISING CONFESSION! THE TRUTH BEHIND THE ASSASSINATION OF OTOHIME!

programme.title: Shirahoshi reveals that she knew the truth about her mother's murder all along, and Luffy makes a bone-crushing entrance when the princess needs him most!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHIRAHOSHI'S TEARS! LUFFY FINALLY SHOWS UP!

programme.title: Hordy announces his plan for turning humans into slaves, the people of Fish-Man Island throw their support behind a new champion, and Luffy amazes even his own friends!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A BIG CLASH! THE STRAW HATS VS. A HUNDRED THOUSAND ENEMIES!

programme.title: Luffy and the gang show off how much stronger they've become by issuing a brutal beat down to Hordy and his ferocious Fish-Man Pirates! Can anything stop the Hats?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DEADLY ATTACKS ONE AFTER ANOTHER! ZORO AND SANJI JOIN THE BATTLE!

programme.title: Hordy's men keep attacking, but the Straw Hats have new weapons at their disposal! Franky unleashes the fury of the Black Rhino, and Luffy turns the tables on Hordy with a little help from his Kraken!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: UNVEILED! THE SECRET WEAPONS OF THE SUNNY!

programme.title: Franky dazzles Usopp and Chopper by transforming into a gigantic fighting robot, Hordy tries to blackmail the Kraken, and Luffy introduces his fist to the Fish-man's face!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IRON PIRATE! HERE COMES GENERAL FRANKY!

programme.title: Luffy shows off even more new powers as he brutally pummels Hordy, but the main attraction proves to be an ancient and immense pirate ship that's heading straight for Fish-Man Island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NOAH CLOSING IN! THE FISHMAN ISLAND FACING DESTRUCTION!

programme.title: Shirahoshi summons the courage to risk everything to save her world, Luffy puts his own life in peril by venturing into the ocean, and Hordy's devious nature fully comes to the surface.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HURRY UP, LUFFY! SHIRAHOSHI'S LIFE IN JEOPARDY!

programme.title: Luffy sets the stage for a final battle with Hordy, Sanji kicks a giant in defense of Nami's honor, and Zoro puts his blades to the ultimate test against a steroid-powered fighting fish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIERCE FIGHT BEGINS! LUFFY VS. HORDY!

programme.title: While Luffy and Shirahoshi try to prevent Fish-Man Island from being crushed, the rest of the Straw Hats square off against the meanest Fish-Man Pirates in the deep blue sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A MASSIVE CONFUSED FIGHT! THE STRAW HATS VS. THE NEW FISHMAN PIRATES!

programme.title: Luffy is the only one who can stop Hordy, but he'll need air to survive the fight, so Shirahoshi's big brother risks his own life in a heroic attempt to get Luffy a bigger bubble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY LOSES THE FIGHT?! HORDY'S LONG-AWAITED REVENGE!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats continue to fight bravely, Luffy tries to find a way to save the island, and the horrible truth about Hordy's hatred for humans is finally revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SHOCKING FACT! THE TRUE IDENTITY OF HORDY!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Orion's Crown has been stolen and is up for grabs at a black-market auction. Lupin has his eyes on both the crown and the auction money, but first he must outsmart the other parties vying for the crown, including Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A two-thousand-year-old casket has been excavated. Inside the casket is Camilla, a beautiful woman in a near-death state, holding a golden statuette of the Virgin Mary. Lupin attempts to steal the golden statuette, but things don't go as planned
programme.sub-title: Lupin Who Turned into a Vampire

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are attending a party in Africa, waiting for an opportunity to snatch a rare black pearl. However, their plan goes awry when a gang of gorillas crashes the party and steals the black pearl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Massive riches have been hidden inside Tsukikage Castle. Lupin and his gang must decipher a code to find out the whereabouts of this great treasure. Wii Lupin be able to locate the treasure before his rivals do?
programme.sub-title: Uncover the Secret of Tsukikage Castle

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen head to Mongolia in search of Genghis Khan's treasures. Meanwhile, Goemon is visiting his ancestor's grave to pay his respects when he encounters Fujiko, who is in search of Yoshitsune Minamoto's buried treasure.
programme.sub-title: The Hidden Gold of Genghis Khan

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO chief promises to erase Fujiko's criminal record in exchange for her cooperation in arresting Lupin. Up against an ego-bruised Inspector Zenigata and a determined Fujiko, have Lupin's heisting days come to an end?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen sneak on board a ship smuggling diamonds. However, what they find on board are several thousand chickens! Lupin and his gang infiltrate the Hong Kong smuggling boss's lair where diamonds are being illicitly sold
programme.sub-title: Diamonds Disappeared Under the Sky of Hong Kong

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal a suitcase containing Costa Rican diamonds, but the contents turns out to be Inspector Zenigata. The real diamonds are being shipped to Puerto Rico inside a missile and Lupin must find out the precise launch time to intercept it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaguya, a beautiful woman, separately asks Lupin, Jigen and Goemon to gather the tears of the Yeti, a mermaid's scale, and the liver of a dragon so she can make a secret potion.
programme.sub-title: Search for the Treasure of Princess Kaguya

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A wealthy shipping magnate and also a bachelor, Onabes' final voyage is nothing short of extravagant, with a ship full of beautiful women and fine art. Things go as planned when Lupin infiltrates the ship disguised as a woman

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Hong Kong for a vacation when he is asked to find a woman in return for helping him escape from Inspector Zenigata. Lupin discovers the pickpocket who stole his wallet is the daughter of the woman he is looking for
programme.sub-title: Where are the Peking Man's Bones?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Sleeping Lion, a statue made of solid gold, is being transported to a museum by a specially armored, airtight car. Lupin steals the armored car together with the statue and nearly asphyxiated Inspector Zenigata inside.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal crime boss Mulligan's precious jewels, only have them stolen from him by Fujiko! Mulligan, unaware that Fujiko has his jewels, hires a skilled gunman named Hangman to take them back from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has been put on auction at the Wanted Club and Dr. Mad places the winning bid. Dr. Mad also purchases Fujiko and Jigen from the auctions. The three are abandoned on a deserted island with killer cyborgs.
programme.sub-title: Lupin is Available to the Highest Bidder

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has his eyes on the royal family's Imperial State Crown, but thanks to Scotland Yard's Inspector Dover, stealing it won't be easy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin announces he's going to steal the betting takes at the Kentucky Derby, but the heist fails. However, it's all part of the plan. Lupin's main target is really the Metropolitan Bank's underground vault.
programme.sub-title: Lupin Laughs at the Alarm Bell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: After several divorces and a couple of deceased husbands, Jacqueline has amassed a fortune and a collection of impressive jewels. In a twist of fate, Lupin and Jacqueline become close... Too close for Jigen and Goemon's comfort

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An illicit auction selling smuggled treasures is taking place. Lupin targets the auction. In the process, Lupin discovers the auctioneer is Cornelia, the woman he once loved who died saving his life
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part One

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is reunited with Cornelia, a woman who died by her father's hands to save Lupin's life. However, Cornelia's memories of Lupin have been erased. Her father is Dr. Zel, a Nazi who has succeeded in resurrecting corpses and controlling them.
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part Two

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko discovers that the Holy Scripture for Immortality is hidden within the jungles of Thailand. However, Emmanuelle Poirot, a cold-hearted beauty, is after them too.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Phantoma Mark III, grandson of the mysterious master thief and disguise artist Phantoma, who terrorized Europe during his heyday, is plotting to take over the world

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The aging Inspector Hanshichi Mikawa, who failed to capture Lupin 10 years ago, is viewed as a nuisance by his peers at the downtown police station. Lupin has announced he'll be stealing the golden Kannon statuette.
programme.sub-title: Detective Hanshichi, The Tenth Year Promise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have stolen the "36 Views of Mt. Fuji," a famous series of 46 woodblock prints, from the exhibition hall. However, a gang calling itself the Shiranami Five challenges Lupin head-on by stealing one of the prints from him.
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part One

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Goemon, siding with the Shiranami Five, challenges Lupin to a one-on-one duel. While Goemon keeps Lupin busy, the Shiranami Five steals the 36 Views, but one of its members, Kikuko Benten, betrays her gang and escapes with the loot.
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part Two

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a wild whim, Inspector Zenigata swipes a throwing coin owned by his great Edo-era ancestor, Heiji Zenigata while he's viewing the inside of an incredible new safe protected by Professor Hunter's super computer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are after the Aurora Droplet, a diamond adorning a prima ballerina's tiara. During the heist, Jigen is wounded and in a twist of fate, is saved by Monica, the prima ballerina.
programme.sub-title: The Face of Goodbye at the National Border

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: After shaking off Inspector Zenigata's pursuit, Lupin is stopped by a monstrously huge Fujiko on his way home! The giant Fujiko turns out to be an illusion created by Madame X. Lupin learns Madame X's hobby is collecting famous people.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious World of Madame X

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Bandit leader Basara is determined to sniff out the location of the diamonds Lupin has hidden somewhere in India. Armed with his sinister invention, the Suicide Ray Gun, he tries to make Lupin talk, even trying his luck with a fake Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Trouble is all but guaranteed when a crime boss and an arms merchant join hands. The two set their eyes on Goemen's sword, which can split a tank in half! After hiring Fujiko to steal it, they transform the sword into an invincible flying weapon of war.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen and Gomen have sent a letter saying they are being held captive in a small but terrifying village. Lupin arrives in the village to rescue them, but Jigen and Goemon are acting oddly.
programme.sub-title: The Sound of the Devil's Bell Calls Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Don Kecchi, the wealthiest man in America, is terminally ill and has announced that he's donating his entire fortune to charity. However, Lupin steals Kecchi's money and shoots Fujiko right in front of Inspector Zenigata!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Margaret Tiffany, the owner of Tiffany's and a TV anchor, hires Lupin and his gang to rob her jewelry store on live TV. Initially, Lupin refuses, but ends up having to go through with it thanks to Fujiko's wild spending habits.
programme.sub-title: Christmas is in the Goddess' Hands

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A princess of a small Silk Road country has been kidnapped. Lupin and his gang are persuaded to rescue Princess Yasmin in exchange for a stomach full of holy curry meant for the gods. However, the kidnapping was a trap to lure Lupin.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Stealth, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: From the director of XXX and The Fast and The Furious comes an exhilarating epic blockbuster starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Academy Award Winner Jamie Foxx (Best Actor, RAY, 2004). rated -PG-13

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves is a space-age courier who's plugged in, turned on and buffed up to deliver the most important data of the 21st century, wet-wired directly into his brain! A rapid-fire roller coaster of action and high-impact imagery! Rating: R

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Western)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher whos continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar-winning roles.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Western)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter, (1964, Western)
programme.desc: Screen legend Yul Brynner turns in a magnificent performance as a gunfighter who must do battle with his most formidable adversary - his own conscience - in this gripping, double-barreled western full of surprise twists and colorful villainy.

programme.title: Black Fox, (1995, Western)
programme.desc: This wild Western tells of Alan Johnson (Christopher Reeve, "Superman") and his friend whom he freed from slavery as they settle with their families in Texas in the 1860s and begin a new life.

programme.title: Strange Wilderness, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Animal enthusiast Peter Gaulke and his sidekick Fred Wolf host a wildlife TV show "Strange Wilderness," which is in a steep ratings decline. Desperate, Peter hatches a scheme to find the one animal that could turn the show around - Bigfoot.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Timeline, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: The Ring, (2002, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When four teenagers all meet with mysterious deaths exactly one week after watching a videotape, investigative reporter Rachel Keller tracks down the video... and watches it.

programme.title: The Ring Two, (2005, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When evidence at a local crime scene reveals a mysterious unmarked videotape, Rachel realizes that Samara is back and more determined than ever to continue her relentless cycle of terror.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Timeline, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: Hollow Man, (2000, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon and Elisabeth Shue play former lovers who, along with a team of other scientists like themselves, discover the secret of invisibility. Rating: R

programme.title: Maggie and Elijah learn a new survival tactic from Negan; Eugene's group clears walkers to pay their fines; Yumiko interviews for an upper-class job; Daryl learns more about Leah and the Reapers; Gabriel encounters a man of God.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Reapers defend Meridian from an incoming herd; Pope suspects Maggie is behind the attack, while Daryl treads carefully; Alexandrians scramble to protect themselves when a violent storm leaves them vulnerable to walkers.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl, Maggie, Gabriel, Negan and Elijah battle the Reapers for food; Aaron and the Alexandrians must survive a storm.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The heroes experience Halloween in the Commonwealth; Daryl and Rosita undergo military training led by Mercer; Carol investigates Ezekiel's medical condition.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Eugene looks for Stephanie after she mysteriously goes missing; Connie investigates a story on Trooper Davis; Carol helps Hornsby with a labor dispute at a drug farm.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Aaron and Maggie meet Gov. Pamela Milton as she tours Alexandria, Oceanside and Hilltop; Ezekiel finds himself lucky during a routine checkup; Eugene processes Max's story.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Maggie, Lydia and Elijah help a stranger from another community called Riverbend; they run into Aaron, who tells them about a mission he embarked on with Gabriel as emissaries for the Commonwealth.

programme.title: Maggie, Lydia and Elijah help Aaron and Gabriel on a rescue mission; in the chaos, Negan finds himself watching over Hershel; Sebastian coerces Daryl and Rosita into pulling a heist.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Hornsby marches Daryl and troops to confront Maggie at Hilltop; after a harrowing heist, Rosita gets Connie, Kelly, Eugene, and Max to investigate the Miltons; Ezekiel helps hospital patients in need.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Maggie prepares to defend Hilltop and the people of Riverbend against Hornsby; Hornsby hires Leah to kill Maggie.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl and Negan rush to the Commonwealth to stop Hornsby from going after their families; Pamela deals with protestors demanding justice for Sebastian's crimes; Mercer needs Rosita's help to fight a swarm.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi receives a love letter from Tuxedo Mask, stating that hed like to meet her. She finds out that all the girls in town received the same letter.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Joy: A Love Letter from Tuxedo Mask

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls search for a vacation spot so they can focus on training. Instead, they settle on a mansion that has a very eerie service staff.
programme.sub-title: The Summer, the Beach, Youth and Ghosts

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami spots Nephrite and follows him to an animation studio that is making the Sailor V movie. Ami calls Usagi and Rei so they can investigate.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Children's Dreams: Friendship Through Anime

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Diamonds is hosting a party to reveal their treasure to the world. Both the Sailor Guardians and the Dark Kingdom crash the party.
programme.sub-title: Romance Under the Moon: Usagi's First Kiss

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Naru has fallen in love with Masato Sanjoin. Knowing that Sanjoin is really Nephrite, Usagi tries to convince Naru to give up on her feelings.
programme.sub-title: Wish upon a Star: Naru's First Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nephrite uncovers Sailor Moons identity as Usagi. His attempt to finish her off is cut short when he learns that Naru has been kidnapped by Zoisite.
programme.sub-title: Naru's Tears: Nephrite Dies for Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new girl named Makoto Kino transfers to Usagis school, but her tough attitude seems to scare everyone away. Usagi quickly becomes friends with her.
programme.sub-title: Jupiter, the Powerful Girl in Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians grow in strength with its newest member Sailor Jupiter joining the team. Sailor Moon is appointed as team leader.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi learns that a transfer student named Ryo Urawa seems to have a crush on Ami, and tries to help him out.
programme.sub-title: Crushing on Ami: The Boy Who Can See the Future

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru attend an art exhibit by Yumemi Yumeno. Usagi and Mamoru are both asked by Yumemi to become models for her latest painting.
programme.sub-title: The Painting of Love: Usagi and Mamoru Get Closer

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Makoto discover Motoki has a girlfriend named Reika. His relationship is in jeopardy due to Reikas chance to study abroad.
programme.sub-title: Total Chaos: The Messy Love Rectangle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Grandpa Hino has become emotionally unstable, causing Rei to worry. The new apprentice Yuichiro tries to cheer her up.
programme.sub-title: Grandpa Loses Control: Rei in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and friends meet a girl who they believe holds the final Rainbow Crystal. But they realize its her pet cat that possesses the Rainbow Crystal!
programme.sub-title: Loved and Chased: Luna's Worst Day Ever

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Umino seems to have fallen in love with Naru. Naru only considers Umino a friend, so Usagi decides to play Cupid and urges them to go on a date.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: When the exploits of a Sailor Moon imposter become quite the sensation, the real Sailor Guardians step in to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Enter Venus, the Last Sailor Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Now that Sailor Venus has joined the team, all of the Sailor Guardians are finally together! Zoisite has discovered that Tuxedo Mask is Mamoru Chiba.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Silver Crystal: The Moon Princess Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tuxedo Mask is wounded while protecting Sailor Moon. The seven Rainbow Crystals gather and she is transformed into Serenity.
programme.sub-title: Returning Memories: Usagi and Mamoru's Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is haunted by dreams of Tuxedo Mask, who has been abducted by the Dark Kingdom. Minako takes Usagi to a popular hair salon hoping it will help.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Confusion: Is Tuxedo Mask Evil?

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi decides to take the Princess Seminar course and the other Sailor Guardians join her. This is actually a trap set up by the Dark Kingdom.
programme.sub-title: Let's Become a Princess: Usagi's Bizarre Training

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to a ski resort to participate in the Moon Princess Contest, unaware that its Kunzites plan to eliminate the Moon Princess.
programme.sub-title: The Snow, the Mountains, Friendship and Monsters

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Figure-skating Janelyn & Misha offer to coach. Usagi and her friends decide to investigate. Makoto begins to receive personal lessons from Misha.
programme.sub-title: Paired with a Monster: Mako, the Ice Skating Queen

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi goes on a family vacation, where she is unexpectedly reunited with Mamoru. But Mamoru no longer remembers Usagi or even who he really is.
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Lake Yokai: The Bond of Usagi's Family

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Dark Kingdom is trying to revive the Seven Great Monsters. Sailor Mercury and Jupiter scramble to protect Ryo Urawa.
programme.sub-title: I Won't Run Away from Love Anymore: Ami vs. Mamoru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako receives a surprise visit from Katarina, Minakos former partner. A tragic incident forced them to go their separate ways.
programme.sub-title: Sailor Venus's Past: Minako's Tragic Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon and the other Sailor Guardians appear to have a falling-out. But its all part of the plan to locate the enemys hideout.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Abandoned: The Falling-Out of the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Venus finds the Dark Kingdom's hideout. The Sailor Guardians fall into Kunzites trap, which hurls them into the past.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Awakening: A Message from the Distant Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians head into the Arctic Circle. Queen Beryl sends the DD Girls. The Sailor Guardians fall as they try to defeat the DD Girls.
programme.sub-title: Death of the Sailor Guardians: The Tragic Final Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon attempts to free Endymion from Queen Beryls control. Sailor Moon is forced to fight the man she loves.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Eternal Wish: A Brand New Life

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Having lost all memory of being Sailor Moon, Usagi now lives her life as an ordinary girl.
programme.sub-title: Moon Returns: The Mysterious Aliens Appear

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon finds herself facing new enemies from outer space. The two aliens disguise themselves as humans to go after other human energy.
programme.sub-title: For Love and for Justice: Sailor Guardians Once Again

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi, Mako, and Ami see a boy attacked by one of Ail and Ans Cardian monsters. To Makos surprise, the boy turns out to be her childhood friend.
programme.sub-title: For Whom Is the White Rose? The Moonlight Knight Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi goes to a virtual reality arcade in the Juban District, where she unexpectedly runs into Mamoru, as well as Seijuro and Natsumi.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Crisis: The Tiara Stops Working

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying the cherry blossoms when the Cardian Leshy attacks. The Sailor Guardians are caught.

programme.title: Knowing, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A professor (Nicolas Cage) and his son obtain an encoded time-capsule document that lists every major disaster over the past 50 years and predicts a future global calamity.

programme.title: Divergent, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: In a future society, people are divided into factions based on their personalities. After a young woman (Shailene Woodley) learns she is a Divergent and will never fit into any one group, she uncovers a conspiracy to destroy all those like her.

programme.title: Stan tem um novo cachorro chamado Sparky, que ao que tudo indica, gay. Isso vira motivo de piada entre seus amigos. Quando Sparky foge, Stan vai ao Santurio de Animais do Grande Gay Al e aprende algumas coisas sobre a homossexualidade.
programme.desc: South Park - S1E4

programme.title: O av de Stan est fazendo 102 e quer se matar, mas como no pode fazer isso sozinho, pede a ajuda de Stan. Enquanto isso, a senhora Broflovski protesta contra um famoso programa da televiso um tanto quanto inapropriado.
programme.desc: South Park - S1E6

programme.title: A tia Flo est de visita e d um presente para Stan: um peixe medonho. Com o tempo, comeam a aparecer alguns cadveres por a, e a me de Stan tenta fingir que no tem nada a ver.
programme.desc: South Park - S2E15

programme.title: Os rapazes esto tendo problemas com sua banda de rock "Moop" e Cartman sai do grupo para formar a sua prpria banda de rock cristo e assim ganhar uma aposta de Kyle quando consiga um disco de platino antes deles.

programme.title: Aps a enorme quantidade de mortos em acidentes de trnsito envolvendo idosos no volante, a gerao mais jovem de South Park decide tirar as licenas de conduzir de todos eles. Porm, nenhum deles ficar de braos cruzados.
programme.desc: South Park - S7E10

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversrio, sua me levar ele e trs amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park - S7E11

programme.title: Um novo aluno mrmon se muda South Park, mas no se d bem com ningum. Os rapazes querem que Stan comece uma briga com ele, mas na verdade, ele acaba se tornando seu amigo.
programme.desc: South Park - S7E12

programme.title: Depois de receberem a visita de um grupo anti-tabagista, os rapazes comeam a fumar. Ao ver a oportunidade de escapar do castigo, eles dizem aos seus pais que na verdade a culpa das tapacarias.
programme.desc: South Park - S7E13

programme.title: Wendy termina o seu relacionamento com Stan, e para ajud-lo, os meninos o levam a um restaurante famoso por suas asas de frango e suas belas garonetes. Mas o plano no funciona e Stan se une a um grupo de gticos.
programme.desc: South Park - S7E14

programme.desc: South Park - S7E15

programme.desc: South Park - S8E1

programme.title: Jimmy e Timmy treinam para participar das Olimpadas Especiais de Denver. Enquanto isso, Cartman se disfara para convencer um comit qualificado de que ele deficiente e assim pode participar e ganhar o prmio.

programme.desc: South Park - S8E5

programme.title: Os protetores dos animais se manifestam contra o uso de uma vaca como mascote da escola, e os estudantes se veem forados a buscarem uma nova mascote, o que gera um conflito entre Cartman e Kyle, j que ambos tem ideias diferetes.

programme.desc: South Park - S8E9

programme.title: Cartman estava tentando voar, mas o mximo que conseguiu foi um golpe na cabea e isso fez com que ele ficasse dois dias em coma. A polcia local assume que agora Cartman tem poderes psquicos e que pode resolver casos extraordinrios.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato - S2E61

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis - S2E63
